title: EASL Guideline Query Workflow
description: Handling query to EASL Guideline Agent in background

todos.text: Creating question query and generating context

subTodos.text: Base question : What is the DILI diagnostic for Sarah Miller according EASL guideline? Consider Sarah Miller is a 63-year-old female with a history of rheumatoid arthritis, essential hypertension, and mild chronic kidney disease. She was on methotrexate and developed jaundice, fatigue, and elevated liver enzymes after starting trimethoprim-sulfamethoxazole.
Detailed Question is generated by ContextGen Agent

todos.text: Send query to EASL Guideline Agent
